title: Ongoing Drop-Ins
description: RIM is a Community Insight Meditation Center dedicated to providing a spiritual refuge for all who wish to live with greater wisdom, compassion, and well-being.
cleaned_text: Learning, practicing, and Growing Together. Rooted In Mindfulness is a community of people from all backgrounds who come together to grow our natural capacity for wisdom, compassion, well-being, and true happiness. Through traditional teachings, meditation, mindful living, and community support, we aim to live in ways that benefit ourselves, others, and our shared world.
